website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a blender that can replace a lot of your small appliances without breaking the bank, you can't go wrong with the reasonably priced Ninja Ultima.
pros: The Ninja Ultima BL810 blender performs as well as models that cost twice as much
cons: The Ninja Ultima looks bulky and you may not like having to keep track of the various accessories

customer_reviews.title: Grime in bottom of pitcher
customer_reviews.text: Would get five stars if it wasnt so hard to clean!!! And im not talking about rinsing between uses or tossing it in the dishwasher but over time water and gunk starts forming up in the bottom. The slots in the bottom where it sits on the blender are un reachable unless you take the black handle off and you can see the grime through the plastic of the blender. I would reccommend not ever letting the outside of the bottom get wet of at all possible. Just keep washing the inside out as soon as you use it!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I **LOVE** this blender! I've owned a Bosch in the past but this baby is more powerful than it was. Salsa? Oh yeah, keep your finger on pulse or you'll have puree! I am enjoying a super easy morning smoothie-yogurt, frozen fruits and a touch of milk. It is done in seconds and smooth as anything you've ever tried, no lumps or chunks. It is a dream to clean also. I put a bit of water in it, maybe 1-2cups, and a drop of dishwashing liquid and run for a few seconds...it whips it everywhere and you're left with just rinsing all those suds out and letting it air dry. It is loud, all those horses ;) but no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly powerful and totally awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've been having a smoothie for breakfast every day for a very, very long time. When my old blender died, I was heartbroken. I didn't know what to eat for breakfast. I was left starving until lunch time. Then, my Ninja arrived. I didn't even know what I had been missing! The difference in smoothie quality was REMARKABLE. This thing makes truly Jamba Juice quality smoothies. Yes, as one reviewer pointed out, it's loud. But guess what? So are lawn mowers, and many of them have weaker motors than this blender. You could probably turn bricks into a drinkable smoothie in the Ninja. Worth every penny. So glad I didn't get a Blend-tec or Vitamix.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: The good part of it is the individual containers for making ...
customer_reviews.text: When my old Vitamix went away I bought this. I found it very difficult to clean if anything is spilled outside the container; there are lots of little nooks and crannies in the base. It does not make nut butters as I had expected (my main reason to buy it). The good part of it is the individual containers for making drinks and smoothies - those were very handy. I do think the sipping hole is a bit cumbersome. I sold it and bought a Vitamix again.
customer_reviews.author: Rand Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome, but sounds like a jet engine taking off. Four stars because the first one broke, and I had to return it. The little pour spout cover cracked and anything I blended came spewing out the side. The square trade coverage I got was cheap, but they almost didn't help me. I had to push them and escalate the situation to get a result. When we got a new blender, we got a different (maybe updated) model that actually worked much better overall.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: JAS reviews
customer_reviews.text: As good as I expected. A bit noisy -- I do feel I need to use workshop ear protectors for the noise -- I just keep a pair in the kitchen with the blender. I especially like the individual cup size that came with it. My husband and I both use the blender for individual drinks frequently. It does very well with ice in the mixture. The base has suction cup feet, so even though the base is quite light, the feet grip very well, even on less than smooth surfaces. I store the blender in a cupboard when not in use, so the lightness of it is a real asset.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: The Ninja Blender
customer_reviews.text: What a powerful machine. Yes, a bit on the noisy side but sure does blend things well and quick. So the benefits far outway the noisy part. Super for making smoothies and shakes, plus the individual containers are just right for making yourself that one favorite drink. And don't worry about the ingredients on the top because they will come down to the bottom and get blended. Nothing like the other blenders I have owned, this is just so much better and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Ruiter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, absolutely nothing flimsy about it. Very beefy drive connections lots of teeth for trouble free set ups. Strong and sharp blades, be careful unpacking them-ouch. Does a smoothie with frozen fruit in 2 or 3 short pulses. Pulverizes ice cubes like an industrial unit. Looks good on a counter top, Love everything about it. I used standard shipping, which arrived when it said it would. Only downside so far is the base is pretty big, but again good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to the vitamix
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. This thing is a beast. It crushes ice no problem, makes beautifully smooth daiquiris or smoothies, etc. The extra cups it comes with are great for smoothies on the go. My one complaint is that I don't think the pitcher BPA free though, so I wish they'd change that. When making baby food, cool ingredients before blending them.
customer_reviews.author: StaceyA

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: In looking for a powerful and robust blender for making protein and smoothie drinks, my research lead me to the Ninja Ultima blender. This thing is amazing; it makes perfect smoothies every time from fresh fruits, nuts and seeds. It is noisy compared to other blenders I've used but the results are very consistent. One tip is to wash the blades and jug right after use as there are nooks and crannies that become hard to clean if it's left out and becomes dry.
customer_reviews.author: LGM

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blender back in February of 2014. It has been a phenomenal blender for all of your ordinary household uses. I have only had one problem, and that was that the little safety pin broke off. So I contacted ninja directly and they were VERY prompt and courteous. (And about as question free as it gets. They only wanted the serial number)They sent me a replacement lid for the blender immediately which I received in about two days time. I am overall satisfied with this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Glidden

customer_reviews.title: Love this blender!!
customer_reviews.text: Hundreds of dollars cheaper than a Blendtec or Vitamix and works just as well. Handles soups and thick smoothies with ease. Used it probably fifty times this past summer and always amazed at how smooth it makes the smoothies. It's powerful, simple to use, easy to clean. Plus I love the lid-closed detection and the suction cups on the bottom that secure it to the counter. Complaints - it's really friggin loud!
customer_reviews.author: Dan F.

customer_reviews.title: well made powerful blender!
customer_reviews.text: professional strength blender. our whole family loves it. bit loud but powerful blender. no problem pulverizing nuts. Use it every day. Only thing is be careful washing the blade. I cut myself few times already, it is very sharp. I highly recommend this product. Good way to consume fruits and veggies. I drink twice a day. Lost 25lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome blender, but I'v been through two lids so far. They keep breaking under regular use. The rest of the machine is tip top!
customer_reviews.author: J DelToro

customer_reviews.title: I use it every day
customer_reviews.text: my purpose in getting this was to lose weight. My old blender didn't blend veggies into greenies. I have lost 10 lbs in a month. YOU CAN"T TASTE THE GREEN STUFF IF IT IS PULVERIZED. When kale, spinach, beet tops, and turnip greens wind up having no taste you know this thing works great. And it is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Cavender

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product and Experience
customer_reviews.text: My first order wasn't complete, but a quick call and Amazon immediately took care of it.I now have a complete blender with all attachments.I have used this many times and am very pleased with my purchase.I very highly recommend this blender and Amazon. Thank you so very much.
customer_reviews.author: JaCee

customer_reviews.title: It surprised us how it made easy work out of blending many citrus fruits all TOGETHER
customer_reviews.text: When we first started using our BL830 the sound of the unit sort of scared us. We have always used something much, much smaller and not at all imposing. Yet, this BL 830 actually scared us ---you know we being old people and all. So, after our first trial test drive and getting over the fear of the power of the BL830 we sort of warmed up to it. It surprised us how it made easy work out of blending many citrus fruits all TOGETHER. And there is the KEY word to describe this remarkable machine. (TOGETHER). We love the Ninja BL830. Thanks to the company for making such an outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: deleah&Cheiro honlomarr

customer_reviews.title: Love the blender and use it at least twice a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the blender and use it at least twice a day. I would have rated it a 5 however, at times the blender will stop and I have to unplug, wait a few seconds and then it will work again. The system does not short. It is a protection to keep the blender motor from burning out. While I love that this feature exists to keep from burning the motor out it is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry S Love

customer_reviews.title: the king of all blenders.
customer_reviews.text: One of the few items I've ever bought that completely lives up to it's hype. Best blender I've ever used, and I've gone through a lot of them over the years Everything from the lid design, to how the base screws on is brilliant engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Lyonardo

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this blender I like to be able to ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this blender I like to be able to blend the whole vegetable for the fiber. I have also made almond milk and peanut butter with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: BL800 is like a nutribullet on steroids.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome blender. I use it to liquefy my veggie/fruit shakes. Broccoli, tomatoes, carrots, kale, lettuce, whatever else. It pulverizes it. Then I simply store the blender bottle in the fridge. When I'm done then I put in some water and turn it on high for 15 seconds or so to clean it. Then use it again. So easy to use that I have two veggie/fruit shakes every day.
customer_reviews.author: RSH

customer_reviews.title: Great blender that is a little bulky.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great, my wife and I love the single serving containers. This thing is very bulky and no easy way of picket up and putting it away (just not very ergonomic in this way). It blends wonderfully, best home made smoothie we ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product but in less then 3 years it ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product but in less then 3 years it is not working. A screw popped off the lid so you have to hold the lid down to make it work. Additionally, the safety mechanisms only allow it to work if the base and blenders are perfectly together. It isn't working anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This blender is great can not get enough of using it
customer_reviews.text: This blender is great can not get enough of using it. If you want a machine that can do just about anything you should go and purchase this. I can not say enough great things about it but go and get you one.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Super fantastic - exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Super fantastic - exceeded my expectations. I now LOVE making smoothies for both my husband and myself. Also have made A LOT of tomato juice and tomato soup with the help of the blender.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R.

customer_reviews.title: What the??????
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know blenders could be this powerful. I used to agitate myself using the el-cheapos and decided to splurge. This thing will crush ice and spit out a perfect smoothie in about 15 seconds. Unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Stonewall

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Though very powerful and very loud, it still leaves bits of veggies that should have been better blended. My best blender purchase to date, but if looking for a smoothie blender, this is very good...not great!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C Gilson

customer_reviews.title: Great blender.
customer_reviews.text: Great versatility and power. I've been drinking smoothies so many times more than before we got this great blender. Also, it's been top notch to prep fresh wholesome baby food. Cleaning the blades can be tricky, but nothing a good brush can't handle.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: For the cost and durability it was an excellent choice. I wanted the pulp in the drinks whereas a juicer separated the pulp. Lots of nutrients in the pulp - I wanted that. Plus it is still smooth to drink!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Makes a frap just like Starbucks for 1/10th of the Starbucks price
customer_reviews.text: Paid for itself within a month between the smoothies and the ice coffee. Makes a frap just like Starbucks for 1/10th of the Starbucks price.
customer_reviews.author: Gam3Gurl

customer_reviews.title: too much power but i like it.
customer_reviews.text: so powerfull . im using only the one serving container, and im scare of use the whole unit!! too much power but i like it.
customer_reviews.author: LETICIA  S LOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: I do love it, though it is very large and very ...
customer_reviews.text: I do love it, though it is very large and very powerful, so remember that! It doesn't work on "slow speed" at all!
customer_reviews.author: R. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: I state that I love this blender
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a while now & every time I finish using it, I state that I love this blender. Incredible buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: A lot larger than we thought, doesn't fit under the counter with the blender piece... but works great and we love it!!! Chops ice fabulously!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THE POWER
customer_reviews.text: This blender is absolutely wonderful. I love its power, the fact that you can just place it in the dishwasher and it gets totally clean, oh my goodness i LOVE LOVE LOVE this unit. I would buy it again...only one small think, i can't find the owners manual guess i will go online and download one. Great for everything
customer_reviews.author: karen dandridge

customer_reviews.title: Best for cost
customer_reviews.text: this thing will blend gravel into sand! slight exaggeration,.. but its a great blender!
customer_reviews.author: ulee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This blender is amazing, I have gotten into the habit of eating a vegetable smoothie almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Thundarian

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good machine. I would recommend. It's good to have the entire vegetable/fruit, which is the advantage over a juicer. (Be careful; blades are sharp.)
customer_reviews.author: Tamara A. Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: If you like smoothies, get one of this
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is reliable. Started using it daily about a month ago. Very powerful unit with a lot of safety factors. If you like smoothies, get one of this.
customer_reviews.author: FFM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the ind cups so I don't have to use the big one to make my smoothies
customer_reviews.author: carmanna seay

customer_reviews.title: and enjoy all of the smoothies that we create from it ...
customer_reviews.text: This blender was everything we had expected and then some..we use it almost every day, and enjoy all of the smoothies that we create from it and the book have been very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: I love the Ninja Ultima Blender Plus (BL830)
customer_reviews.text: I love the Ninja Ultima Blender Plus (BL830). I use it everyday for our smoothies. It is perfect for our family uses.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: I've owned other ninja products and always happy. But this one is the BEST
customer_reviews.text: I've owned other ninja products and always happy. But this one is the BEST! Way better than pro model. Hard to believe til you try it! Then you will understand. It's AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: candelario martinez III

customer_reviews.title: Nice Powerful Machine.
customer_reviews.text: Love how powerful it is. I can make my smoothies way faster than before. Its quite loud, but its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: M.C. & J.V.

customer_reviews.title: The power of an outboard motor along with the equivalent noise.
customer_reviews.text: This thing can cut / chop / hack its way through anything. Its like a Mercury outboard motor. Downside - the noise! You need hearing protection to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy W. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Smoothie Monster
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. My wife and I make smoothies all the time now. I know it's a bit pricy but it's worth it. The blades are a bit tough to clean as you have to try to avoid slicing yourself while cleaning them.
customer_reviews.author: k greene

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and fun to use. Not quite as good as the Vitamix, but darn close and much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Smileytown

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: Performs as advertised. I even use it without the extra blades and it seems to do just as well as the 2yr old vitamix I was using. My wife makes awesome soups and shakes with it. No complaints other than the obnoxious plastic locking lid, but that's minor.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M. Siegert

customer_reviews.title: Motor went out after two years of moderate use!
customer_reviews.text: Paid $200 bucks for this and it lasted about two years. Wouldn't recommend it unless you buy the added protection for 4 years. A product this expensive should last longer than two!
customer_reviews.author: Gordy

customer_reviews.title: because I thought the lid of the pitcher looked like a rat pack style hat
customer_reviews.text: I named it Deano, after Dean Martin, because I thought the lid of the pitcher looked like a rat pack style hat. Anyway, this thing blends the hell out of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Started smoking after 10 uses. Ninja sent a replacement but was a different model.
customer_reviews.author: carmine berardinelli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice Item will buy from again. AAA+++ will let others known.
customer_reviews.author: Jose tony

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I gave this to my wife for Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I gave this to my wife for Christmas and she has used it everyday since. She said she really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: jim dearinger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great, it does what it says it will do
customer_reviews.author: NWW

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift to our daughter. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Whittle

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Power
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Made peanut butter among other tough tests. It's big! but you buy it for the power it delivers. Overkill if you intend to use it for most home drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick powerful effective - nice to go cups
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a crusher and I dont have to use a magic push wand. Quick powerful effective - nice to go cups!
customer_reviews.author: GeoMan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love my blender! It's super powerful and blends everything to a nice smooth texture within a seconds. I put a lot of frozen fruit and nuts in the blender and have had zero issues. It is noisy but it works so fast that it doesn't bother us.
customer_reviews.author: taylor lee

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this product pros: single serves blends perfectly and all in all easy to clean. cons: only one i found and is that its a little loud but thats to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new blender. Fantastic for making any kind of smoothie. Haven't tried making soups or sauces yet but expect that to work just as good. Cleaning is super easy. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic machine--just wish it were quieter. Sounds like an airplane is trying to take off in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent on smoothies, looking forward to making iced drinks to see it's capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Capello

customer_reviews.title: Ninja Rocks
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Ninja blender. I wanted to start making green smoothies and need a blender that would blend things fine enough. It does that and more. It is easy to use and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Ninja Ultima Blender Plus (BL830)  - Great Blender for Making Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this blender as it blends perfectly and when making a smoothie with spinach and kale, this is an important factor.
customer_reviews.author: Kirin K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for smoothies & it works great, no more ice chunks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ninja Blender
customer_reviews.text: So far we really like the blender. Very easy to use and super easy to clean up. As of now I would recommend the item.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Trasky

customer_reviews.title: i would recommend this as good alternative to the Vitamix if money ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this blender for 3 weeks now and have only used it for smoothies so far. I really wanted the Vitamix but couldn't justify spending that kind of money. I have blended smoothies with raw carrots, spinach, frozen fruit and ice and it has had no problem. The reason I didn't give it 5 stars is when blending apples with the skin it was not completely smooth but still drinkable. i would recommend this as good alternative to the Vitamix if money is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Friesen

customer_reviews.title: Kids made me do it.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fruit smoothies, which the kids made me by it for. I can't get away with not making them now, but it's very healthy for us all. Only dislike is that they didn't make the power button automatic, you have to stand an hold it down.
customer_reviews.author: REM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This machine is the best. I use it almost every day. Easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift to family member. They where excited to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Partee

customer_reviews.title: And I don't know a Vitamix could perform better (never owned/used one)
customer_reviews.text: Oh man. This thing has powered through so many things. I've had it for a while and it still performs really well. I'll NEVER buy Cuisinart-level brands again. And I don't know a Vitamix could perform better (never owned/used one). But this thing is amazing. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blender at a great price .
customer_reviews.text: Awesome power ... great price.. no regrets.. Truly recommend it ... use it almost every day..
customer_reviews.author: Jose Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: Still learning how to use the big pitcher but I use the cups almost daily to several times a day. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Cherise Damori

customer_reviews.title: Monster Blender!!!
customer_reviews.text: We've only had it for a month, but so far it has delivered everything advertised, and more! We're quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: John Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I would recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I would recommend this to everyone, it takes the place of several appliances.
customer_reviews.author: sharon cusano

customer_reviews.title: Best Blender Period
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a blender this effective and I have had several. There are few blenders in this category which cam out perform this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm C.

customer_reviews.title: Wanted it for the green smoothie diet
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I wanted and you can get more attachments if wanted so why not enjoy what can save you lots of money from Jamba Juice and eventually break even after saving 45 trips to Jamba Juice.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene C Fortin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job blending any type of smoothie. The single serve option is very convenient and works out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Randhir Singh Ahluwalia

customer_reviews.title: a must buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I work at an assisted living facility, and we have many diets that we need to accommodate. And this ninja has made life in kitchen much simpler!!! Worker great for pureeing any kind of food!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Really love the single serving cups
customer_reviews.text: It's no Vita-Mix but it does the job. Really love the single serving cups!!! Great feature.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this due to a great price and brand. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucja Lubieniecki

customer_reviews.title: I love this Ninja so much that I use it everyday ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this Ninja so much that I use it everyday to make my smoothies and it purees better than my food processor.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great blender, makes smoothies with a perfect consistency. I took a chance and bought this based on the other reviews. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use and does a great job. We make protein shakes in the containers. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Misleading advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this expecting to receive 3 single serving cups, as advertised and even in the description. This only comes with 2 cups. Other than this misleading document, the blender functions as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Burl

customer_reviews.title: It smelled like it was burning up inside on each use and ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk. This item is huge and heavy. It has suction cups on the bottom making it hard to move around the counter. It also was defective. It smelled like it was burning up inside on each use and smoke poured out the back on several occasions. We're returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Roche

customer_reviews.title: Terrific blender, terrific vendor
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on Monday and it was here in 24 hours. It's noisy but it's very effective. Cleanup is easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wallace Taylor

customer_reviews.title: not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Received item, didn't work right out of the package, then to have to pay $20.00 to return it!not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Keith W. Herrick

customer_reviews.title: Just blew up my second Ultima
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this blender in January. A few days after I received it, I was blending frozen frozen fruit, water and whey protein in a blending cup.. It started smoking and and smelled of burned rubber. I returned it without any problems from Amazon and received a replacement blender mid-January. I have used it daily since, as my kids love the fruit smoothies we make. Tonight, about a minute into blending frozen brocolli, blackberries and spinach, it started smoking. It will not operate now at all. I enjoyed it while it lasted, and it blended very well, yet four months later and I have a dead blender I can't return to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mcadams

customer_reviews.title: I was wrong again
customer_reviews.text: When shopping, the Ninja BL830 seemed to be what we wanted however, once delivered and unpacked things changed. We discovered that it was more than we needed. We had attempted to find a local store that had one on display but could not, so we went with what we see, at amazon. Pictures always look good but also. The only problem we had was making the decision to send the unit back and continue to search for what we wanted. We had no problems returning the unit because as always "It is Amazon to the rescue"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ninja ultimate blender
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift and she loves it. She uses it every day. Loves to make shakes in it
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean Miller

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: THE BLENDER IS TOO TALL TO STAND UNDER THE CABINETS. I WANT IT OUT WHEN I'M READY TO USE IT.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: 2 Cups instead of the 3 cups as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Only came with 2 of the single serve cups. I can not review the blender until I can actually use it. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Pulverizes fruits and veggies for smoothies!  2HP ... wowza~!
customer_reviews.text: Another viewer used the word "pulverized" her veggies to make smoothies. I said to myself, "I'm in...that's what I'm looking for!" This machine is incredible. I am 54 years old and have never ever been so impressed with a kitchen appliance in my entire life! My daughter is nursing her newborn and I'm determined to make sure that she has lots of vitamins in her diet. I have been making her fruit smoothies with this machine (indeed it is a machine) and they are totally awesome. This blender is so powerful that it almost lifts off the counter ... pretty impressive! I would recommend this for anyone who wants to make smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Batesy

customer_reviews.title: Locking Lid pin a Definite Problem
customer_reviews.text: Locking Lid is a problem that ruins the entire blender. We enjoyed the blender for making fruit smoothies. But when the tiny locking pin in the lid snapped off, the blender would not turn on. We feel the locking pin is a definite design flaw. We have asked for a replacement lid from the maker and are hoping they will seriously consider replacing the lid with something not so easily broken. We still have not figured out how it broke.
customer_reviews.author: P. McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service Karen
customer_reviews.text: My Ninja Pro's top blade stopped turning. I called 877-646-5288 and they immediately answered and sent me a new pitcher and blade, even though I hadn't even registered my product 6 months ago! If I could give 6 stars, I would! Great customer service Karen!! This baby is very loud, and very tall. it doesn't fit under my countertop like most reviewers said, but it's so awesome I don't even care.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Stav

customer_reviews.title: You may change your review after a few months of using it.
customer_reviews.text: Changing my review because ours is now smoking. I got this to make fruit and veggie smoothies. Most of the time I don't use anything frozen. if I do, it's usually the fruit. But I was just in the kitchen making a smoothie and I poured more water in and it had smoke coming out. This isn't the first time I've noticed this. When it goes off, you can hear this squeeling sound. It gets the job done, but it looks like I may have to replace it soon and I haven't had it very long. Not even 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mercandante

customer_reviews.title: we have never ate so healthy.
customer_reviews.text: I cant compare this with any of the big name blenders as we went from a $30 Cuisinart to the ninja. Every smoothie i have crafted is a synch and comes out delicious and smooth. My favorite so far is to take the single serve cup and stick 1/2 banana, 1 cup frozen peaches, 1/4 avocado, 2 ice cubes, and 3/4 cup of fresh not from concentrate orange juice. Clean up has been pretty easy, i always rinse it out with hot water after use to prevent any sticky residue from the fruit.
customer_reviews.author: David TiffanyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Love my Ninja Ultima Blender Plus!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I used my blender yesterday. It works great. You definitely need to read the instructions before using. I have the smaller version of the Ninja which I used to make smoothies. I purchased the larger one because I always over filled the smaller on. Now I can make a larger amount which will last me longer. No package or delivery complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Rashee

customer_reviews.title: amazing piece of machinery!
customer_reviews.text: I just thought I previously owned a blender. The most annoying things about past blenders was getting them jammed on too many ice cubes or frozen items when making smoothies or just overloading it in general. That has yet to happen after using this heavily for 2-3 months. It isn't a food processor and when we tried sweet potatoes, carrots, and nuts just to see what it would do it seems to just sling them to the outside of the pitcher. I figure there is a trick to doing items like that but haven't tried to find one yet.
customer_reviews.author: aRay

product_meta.title: Ninja Ultima Blender Plus (BL830)
product_meta.description:
NINJA ULTIMA BLENDER+ (BL830)
The Ninja Ultima Blender+ offers beyond professional blade speed and performance to help create chef-inspired results at home! With the Dual Stage Blending technology you can create endless possibilities. Total Crushing blades breakdown ice, whole fruits and vegetables while the High Speed Cyclonic blades puree foods into a smooth and creamy state! Pro Variable Speed offers everything from gentle blending to total crushing to nutrient and vitamin extraction. With Nutri Ninja cups, create delicious, personalized smoothies for on the go with convenient Sip and Seal lids. All parts are BPA free and dishwasher safe.

DUAL STAGE BLENDING TECHNOLOGY
Dual Stage Blending is Ninja’s patent pending gear system which offers high torque Total Crushing technology AND high speed cyclonic blending in one jar to crush down ingredients and then liquefy them. The unique technology allows the two sets of blades to rotate at different speeds in order to first crush the larger ingredients and then quickly liquefy the small chunks. Total Crushing blades pulverize and crush through ice, whole fruits and vegetables in seconds. High speed cyclonic blades then puree the ingredients into a smooth, grit-free consistency.

PRO VARIABLE SPEED
Pro Variable Speed features a 10 speed variable dial as well as a powerful pulse up to 24,000 RPMs! This expansive speed range offers everything from gentle blending to total crushing to Nutrient & Vitamin Extraction. You can easily adjust to the correct speed without worry of over mixing or processing.

NUTRI NINJA NUTRIENT AND VITAMIN EXTRACTION
Nutrient and Vitamin Extraction provides a better tasting, more nutritious kind of beverage. Get a silky smooth cool cup of goodness made entirely from whole fruits, vegetables, and ice cubes. Nutri Ninja technology provides smooth, nutrient-rich beverages filled with vitamins and fiber.

NINJA ULTIMA BLENDER+ (BL830)
 * Model - BL830 
 * Power - 1500 Watts/2.5 HP 
 * Speeds - Pro Variable Speed, 10 Speeds + Pulse 
 * Blender Pitcher Capacity - 72 oz. (9 cups) 
 * Blade Technology - Dual Stage Blending (Total Crushing and High Speed Cyclonic Technology) 
 * Blade Material - Stainless Steel 
 * Nutri Ninja Cup Capacity - 16 oz. (2 cups) 
 * Nutri Ninja Cups Included - 3 
 * Cord Length - 3 feet 
 * Warranty - 2 Years 
 * BPA Free 
 * Dishwasher Safe

WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
1500 Watt Motor Base, 72oz. Blender Pitcher, Blender Pitcher Lid, Removable Total Crushing Blade Assembly, (3) Nutri Ninja Cups, Nutri Ninja Pro Extractor Blade, (3) Nutri Ninja Sip & Seal To Go Lids, Instruction Book, Inspiration Guide

Ninja Ultima FamilyNinja Ultima Blender + with 2 Nutri Ninja Cups (BL810)Ninja Ultima Blender + with 3 Nutri Ninja Cups (BL830)Ninja Ultima Blender + with 3 Nutri Ninja Cups and Cookbook (BL830CB)1500 Watts✓✓✓72oz. Professional Blender Pitcher✓✓✓Dual Stage Blending Technology✓✓✓(2) 16oz. Nutri Ninja Cups with Sip and Seal lids✓(3) 16oz. Nutri Ninja Cups with Sip and Seal lids✓✓64oz. Food Processing Bowl - make 2lbs. of dough!Reversible Slicing/Shredding Disc and Grating DiscUltima Creations 150 Recipe Cookbook✓
feature_bullets: Total Crushing Technology to breakdown ice, whole fruits, and vegetables
High Speed Cyclonic Technology to puree foods into a smooth and creamy state
Pro Variable Speed - 10 speeds plus Pulse
3 Pro Single Serve Cups with Sip & Seal Lids for drinks on the go
